duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage SAP Finance & Controlling (FICO) implementation, Experience in the manufacturing industry.
Work with SMEs and end-users to determine the functional requirements for the system within the SAP Finance & Controlling areas.

Configure FI & CO modules in SAP to meet business requirements, facilitate design session workshops, prepare system functional specifications including customizations for RICEFW objects, review technical specifications, write test scripts, conduct unit and system integration testing, and become FICO domain subject matter expert that supports the end solution through its lifecycle.
Provide leadership and guidance to other systems analysts, business teams, and implementation partner resources.
Help establish the SAP COE by developing best practices, documentation in FICO domain, and establishing benchmarks.
Support cutover activities, training, and post go live support.

education_certification.credential: 4-year degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or equivalent discipline.
Experience coordinating business teams in SAP FICO implementations (preferred)
